titleStmt.title: A letter to the clergy of the diocess [sic] of Norfolk and Suffolk wherein they are desired to challenge the Quakers once more ... to prove which of them are Christ's ministers, which may be done according to the method herein laid down, with very little disputation ... / by a member of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: S. J.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
